pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Multimodal Network Analysis // A set of tools for analysing multimodal networks. All functions operate with matrices, edge lists, and 'igraph', 'network', and 'tidygraph' objects, and on one-mode, two-mode (bipartite), and sometimes three-mode networks. It includes functions for measuring centrality, centralization, cohesion, closure, and constraint, as well as for network block-modelling, regression, and diffusion models. The package is released as a complement to 'Multimodal Political Networks' (2021, ISBN:9781108985000), and includes various datasets used in the book in addition to other network data.
